plot: Exploring the fine line between passion and obsession, Comic-Kaze strives to determine where the point lies for when a hobby starts to consume the hobbyist.
title: Comic-Kaze
plot_es: Exploring the fine line between passion and obsession, Comic-Kaze strives to determine where the point lies for when a hobby starts to consume the hobbyist.
plot_en: Exploring the fine line between passion and obsession, Comic-Kaze strives to determine where the point lies for when a hobby starts to consume the hobbyist.
